rules_text:
Whenever a creature blocks, goad it. [i](Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)[/i]
{2}: Transform Shanaia, Lost Candidate. Activate only if there are no creature cards in your graveyard.
rules_text2:
When this creature transforms into Moebius S, put a stun counter any number of target tapped creatures.
At the beginning of your upkeep if you are stagnant transform Moebius S. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]
